reviewText: Superb thriller - conflict of reality and fate!
I really loved this movie.  I watched like three times on Dramafever and I just brought it.  Buy this drama you will love it.

Action packed period Korean drama with great subtitles. However, the first disc skipped, slowed down and couldn't be watched. Missing several episodes is making the story hard to follow. Watching the second disc and it's fine so far. Hope the rest of the discs don't have this skipping problem.
Awesome drama I really enjoyed watching this drama.
Action packed Korean drama with very good English subtitles.
one of the best dramas i've seen in along time.  I really like Korean period dramas but this is one of the best
